instructions.da: Drej skarpt til højre mod Destination 1
instructions.de: Scharf rechts abbiegen an der Gabelung Richtung Destination 1
instructions.en: Take a sharp right towards Destination 1
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ege dekstren direkte al Destination 1
instructions.es: Gira a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Gira a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Prendre franchement à droite à l’embranchement en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Belok kanan pada pertigaan menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Svolta a destra al bivio verso Destination 1
instructions.nl: Rechtsaf op de splitsing richting Destination 1
instructions.pl: Na rozwidleniu skręć ostro w prawo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva fechada à direita sentido Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Vire acentuadamente à direita em direção a Destination 1
instructions.ro: Virați brusc dreapta la bifurcație spre Destination 1
instructions.ru: Резко поверните направо и продолжите движение в направлении Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 istikametindeki yol ayrımında sola keskin dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Прийміть різко праворуч у напрямку Destination 1
instructions.vi: Quẹo gắt bên phải về hướng Destination 1
